snippet.title: Magicraft 1.0 Version Update  | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Tomorrow is the day that 1.0 version will be released~ Let's see what's new in the 1.0 version!

Main New Content
●New Chapter 5 - Ancient Throne
●New spells bring a billion new builds, and more powerful relics, wands and other props updated!
●Backpack Battle, Warm Snow, and BING in Wonderland collaboration set, as well as Old Tomato, 66, and bilibili TV skins
●Other new functions and rooms

-- Iteration and Optimization --
Camp and room art updates, UI iteration; new monsters in old chapters monsters and so on 

The price of 1.0 version will be $15.99, and there will also be a 14 days Launch Discount of 20% (CST: November 2-November 16)
See you on November 2nd！

Steam：https://store.steampowered.com/app/2103140
Discord：https://discord.com/invite/magicraft-1029926808516309093
